Articles.Content:
http://applicants.mars-one.com/

but im only 14!

need cheering up
Well, at least when they cancel this because they realize it won't work, you are glad you weren't let down? I guess?
You should be happy that you can't go.
I agree with grove. You don't want to be left on a planet with a big sloppy Alien with Huge sharp teeth, and baby aliens that suck your brains out.

Yeah, mars has no night life, well except for the fantastic Olypus Mons festival, but that only happens once every 26,000 years. Now for local excitement, try Titan! Great atmosphere. If you have access to FTL drives, and feel like killing a few hours, try Xlanthia, it's only 4 Lyrs away, but man can they party! Mars? Nah, it's so boring that even aliens don't want it.
